comment.author: 69116039@N07
comment._content:
Poor quality digital transfer--the wavy looking lines in the image are caused by the original negative being curved and contacting the glass surface of the digital scanner. I've had this problem myself. You need to re-do this one and find a creative solution to eliminate the distortion.

Otherwise, this is a great photo.

comment.author: 41131493@N06
comment._content: We have now rescanned this image and replaced it on Flickr.

comment.author: 69116039@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/smu_cul_digitalcollections] Unfortunately it looks much worse now, to tell you the truth.
